author: James Van Straten
title: Bitcoin Treasury Corporation Acquires 292 BTC, Prepares for Toronto Trading Debut
description: Canadian public firm begins trading, commits to bitcoin-backed institutional services.
content:
Bitcoin Treasury Corp. (BTCT), a provider of institutional lending and liquidity services, said it bought 292.80 bitcoin 
 for C$43 million ($31.6 million), launching an accumulation strategy aimed … [+1291 chars]
